alert.note: Alert for Lewis (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 2:22AM EDT until April 01 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Lewis County in northeastern Kentucky... Central Scioto County in southwestern Ohio... * Until 300 AM EDT. * At 221 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Oak Hill to near Camp Dix, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Portsmouth, Wheelersburg, New Boston, Vanceburg, South Webster, Head of Grassy, Rosemount, Clarktown, Camp Dix, Sciotodale, Saint Paul, Minford, Kinniconick, Friendship, Petersville, Stricklett, Rexton, Buena Vista in Scioto County, Firebrick and West Portsmouth. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
